name: Possessed (itch) (Studio Avanto)
description:
"At long last, a vessel! I was getting sick of waiting. Now, how did having legs work again...?"

In Possessed, you play as an evil spirit trying to escape the dungeon using the bodies of disposable adventurers. Navigate your way through spikes, pitfalls and puzzles before your unlucky vessels kick the bucket!

This game was made as our own jam project during the course of a few weeks. It features 3 characters to possess, 4 worlds with 6 stages, each with their own adaptive soundtracks.

Controls:

Arrow keys = move

Up/Space = jump

E = character ability

Q = kill vessel

P = pause
